sermons.title: The Price of Our Redemption
sermons.description: Through Adam's sin, we all were born in bondage to sin and Satan. God so loved us that He sent His only Son to redeem us. He suffered deprivation and rejection by the very ones He came to save. While we were yet sinners he gave His life for our redemption, spilling His blood as the ultimate ransom for us. We have been redeemed by the precious blood of Christ.
